name: eccles-g-minor
body:
### Introduction
This project provides sheet music for Henri Eccles (1670-1742) Sonata in G Minor, along with piano accompaniment arranged by Joseph Salmon (1864-1943). The source for this transcription if J. Salmon's 1914 edition of "Oeuvre D'Auteurs Anciens", Société Anonyme des Éditions Ricordi. The original work is in public domain, and should be available on the Internet via various providers.

The transcription source is provided in [LilyPond](http://lilypond.org/) notation. The PDF output for these are
* [Eccles-G-Minor-All](Eccles-G-Minor-All.pdf)
* [Eccles-G-Minor-Violin](Eccles-G-Minor-Violin.pdf)

### Authors and Contributors
Henri Eccles, Joseph Salmon, Jonathan Chen (@daemonblade)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
